author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Sanjay Nagar police on Saturday arrested a 25-year-old construction labourer for attempting to sexually assault a four-year-old girl. He was caught by the girl’s parents at the construction site. The youth, Gandhar, is from Odisha. The girl’s family is from Ballari and they are also construction labourers.

Gandhar has been booked under various sections of POCSO (Protection of Children from Sexual Offences) and has been remanded to judicial custody.

- Special Correspondent
title: Labourer tries to assault minor, held
